author: DimonPython
long_description: This mod adds 119 new bricks with different textures for your beautiful construction, to craft the first block you will need 9 cobblestones, then you can simply put the resulting bricks into the Crafting grid to get the next look. In order to "polish" the block, click the LEFT mouse button with grinder, if you "polish" the 7th type of block, then you will get 9 cobblestones.
name: simple_brick
title: New bricks
